validation.message: Must be a valid email address

entry.value: // Enter JQuery command here. The event object is passed in as "ev"

[{"style":"","text":"The user name or login that uniquely identifies the user.","controlId":"rapid_P6_C288_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"A longer description of the user. Typically their fully name.","controlId":"rapid_P6_C117_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C118_","text":"The email address will be used to send the user any notifications, or for password resets.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"The password may be left blank depending on the security adapter.","controlId":"rapid_P6_C119_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C120_","text":"If entered will only allow access to the user from the specified device. Use any of IP, NAME, AGENT, MAC, IMEI, IMSI, SIMNO. Multiple conditions can be separated with commas, and multiple rules with semi-colons. The * wildcard is also allowed.
For example AGENT=RapidMobile,IMEI=123456;IP=10* means that the user must be using the Rapid Mobile client with device IMEI 123456, or have an IP address starting with 10. ","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C175_","text":"Tick to allow this user access to Rapid Admin.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C122_","text":"Tick to allow this user access to Rapid Design.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C123_","text":"Tick to allow this user access to manage users only in Rapid Admin.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C321_","text":"If selected then the account is locked and the user will not be able to log in","type":"hover"}]

{"controlHints":[{"style":"","text":"The user name or login that uniquely identifies the user.","controlId":"rapid_P6_C288_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"A longer description of the user. Typically their fully name.","controlId":"rapid_P6_C117_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C118_","text":"The email address will be used to send the user any notifications, or for password resets.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"The password may be left blank depending on the security adapter.","controlId":"rapid_P6_C119_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C120_","text":"If entered will only allow access to the user from the specified device. Use any of IP, NAME, AGENT, MAC, IMEI, IMSI, SIMNO. Multiple conditions can be separated with commas, and multiple rules with semi-colons. The * wildcard is also allowed.
For example AGENT=RapidMobile,IMEI=123456;IP=10* means that the user must be using the Rapid Mobile client with device IMEI 123456, or have an IP address starting with 10. ","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C175_","text":"Tick to allow this user access to Rapid Admin.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C122_","text":"Tick to allow this user access to Rapid Design.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C123_","text":"Tick to allow this user access to manage users only in Rapid Admin.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P6_C321_","text":"If selected then the account is locked and the user will not be able to log in","type":"hover"}]}
